snippet: Senator Jon Tester and his Republican challenger, Representative Denny Rehberg, have both been distancing themselves from Washington and playing up their identities as true Montanans.
abstract: Sen Jon Tester, first-term Democrat from Montana, and Republican challenger Rep Denny Rehberg continue to distance themselves from Washington and play up their identities as true Montanans in a tight race for a potentially pivotal Senate seat.
lead_paragraph: Senator Jon Tester and his Republican challenger, Representative Denny Rehberg, have both been distancing themselves from Washington and playing up their identities as true Montanans.

headline.seo: Tester and Rehberg Fight Over Outsider Label in Montana
headline.main: Tester and Rehberg Fight Over Outsider Label in Montana
headline.print_headline: To Return to Washington, Both Montana Senate Candidates Run Against It
